TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate, class System.Web.UI.ITemplate

Docs.summary: Provides the default implementation of an object, which ASP.NET uses whenever it parses two-way data-binding within the templated content of an ASP.NET control such as . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks ASP.NET uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class whenever it parses declarative two-way data-binding within the templated content of an ASP.NET control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. It is not meant to be used directly in your code.
For more information about ASP.NET data binding, expressions, and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.BuildTemplateMethod buildTemplateMethod, class System.Web.UI.ExtractTemplateValuesMethod extractTemplateValuesMethod) cil managed

Docs.param: A delegate used to handle the method call.
A delegate used to handle the method call.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary ExtractValues(class System.Web.UI.Control container) cil managed

Docs.param: The from which to extract name/value pairs, which are passed by the data-bound control to an associated data source control in two-way data-binding scenarios.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a set of name/value pairs for values bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax within the templated content.
Docs.returns: An of name/value pairs. The name represents the name of the data item field specified as the first parameter to bind within templated content. The value is the current value of a property value bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder.ExtractValues%2A> method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%28System.Web.UI.Control%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstantiateIn(class System.Web.UI.Control container) cil managed

Docs.param: The to contain the controls that are created from the inline template.
Docs.summary: Defines the object that child controls and templates belong to. These child controls are in turn defined within an inline template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn%2A> method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn%28System.Web.UI.Control%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
